mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction VALUES ( seq_transaction_tran_no.NEXTVAL, #{purchaseProd.prodNo}, #{buyer.userId}, #{paymentOption:CHAR}, #{receiverName:VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone:VARCHAR}, #{dlvyAddr:VARCHAR}, #{dlvyRequest:VARCHAR}, #{tranCode:CHAR}, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(#{dlvyDate:DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
mapper.select: SELECT t.tran_no, p.prod_no, p.prod_name, t.buyer_id, t.receiver_name, t.receiver_phone, t.payment_option, t.dlvy_addr, t.dlvy_request, t.tran_status_code, t.order_date, TO_CHAR(t.dlvy_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') dlvy_date FROM product p, transaction t WHERE p.prod_no = t.prod_no(+) AND tran_no = #{tranNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, order_date, tran_status_code FROM transaction ORDER BY order_date DESC ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
